trait.name: Nimble Escape
text: Krenko can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Krenko makes two attacks with his scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage..

action.name: Light Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
text: When a creature Krenko can see targets him with an attack, Krenko chooses another goblin within 5 feet of him. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.
